metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19797 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: In LibSass 3.5.5, a NULL Pointer Dereference in the functionSass::Selector_List::populate_extends in SharedPtr.hpp (used by ast.cpp andast_selectors.cpp) may cause a Denial of Service (application crash) via acrafted sass input file.

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
